Welcome to Driving Miss Daisy.

We provide non-emergency medical & non-medical transportation services. We are much more affordable, reliable and dependable than a taxi service-you’ll be surprised how cost- effective we are!
Learn More

With You, For You, Always'

Our vehicles are licensed by the MNDOT and meet or exceed all Federal, state, local, and A.D.A. guidelines
Learn More

Let’s create something extraordinary together.

Join us now
Schedule

We have convenient scheduling options to book rides in seconds.

Coordinate

We provide with the right vehicle equipped with Wheelchair, Stretcher etc.. for your trip based on your needs.

Ride

Our experienced and freindly staff will be at your assitance and make sure you have pleasant experience.

Review

We always solve the most important problems to have the biggest impact

Our Services

We are a Non Emergency
Medical & Non-Medical transportation service.

DMD is a unique, full service, specialized transportation company. We provide a caring, safe and reliable driving service. Our mission is to provide safe, reliable, cost effective solutions to all your specialized transportation needs.

Door to door pickup/drop off

We provide door to door service from the origin to destination with Wheel chair assitance if required.

Hand in hand

We go an extra mile and provide you additional care and make sure you are safe.

Ambulance

We provide with cost effective non emergency Ambulance services with stretcher if required.
